00066 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_InputPrivate {
00067 public:
00068     string        key;
00069     string        value;
00070     vector<EGS_InputPrivate *> children;
00071     int nref;
00072 
00073     EGS_InputPrivate() : nref(0) {};
00074     EGS_InputPrivate(const string &Key, const string &Val = "") : key(Key),
00075         value(Val), children(), nref(0) { };
00076     EGS_InputPrivate(const EGS_InputPrivate &p, bool deep=false) :
00077         key(p.key), value(p.value), nref(0), children() {
00078         for (unsigned int j=0; j<p.children.size(); j++) {
00079             if (deep) {
00080                 children.push_back(new EGS_InputPrivate(*p.children[j],deep));
00081             }
00082             else {
00083                 children.push_back(p.children[j]);
00084                 children[j]->nref++;
00085             }
00086         }
00087     }
00088 
00089     ~EGS_InputPrivate() {
00090         for (unsigned int j=0; j<children.size(); j++) {
00091             deleteItem(children[j]);
00092         }
00093     };
00094 
00095     int replace(const string &replace_what, const string &replace_with);
00096 
00097     int setContentFromFile(const char *fname);
00098     int setContentFromString(string &input);
00099     int setContent(istream &input);
00100 
00101     int addContentFromFile(const char *fname);
00102     int addContentFromString(string &input);
00103     int addContent(istream &input);
00104 
00105     void processInputLoop(EGS_InputPrivate *p);
00106 
00107     void addItem(EGS_InputPrivate *p) {
00108         p->nref++;
00109         children.push_back(p);
00110     };
00111 
00112     EGS_InputPrivate *takeInputItem(const string &key, bool self=true) {
00113         if (self && isA(key)) {
00114             return this;
00115         }
00116         for (vector<EGS_InputPrivate *>::iterator it=children.begin();
00117                 it != children.end(); it++) {
00118             if (compareKeys((*it)->key,key)) {
00119                 EGS_InputPrivate *res = *it;
00120                 children.erase(it);
00121                 return res;
00122             }
00123             //if( (*it)->key == key ) {
00124             //    EGS_InputPrivate *res = *it;
00125             //    children.erase(it); return res;
00126             //}
00127         }
00128         return 0;
00129     };
00130 
00131     EGS_InputPrivate *getInputItem(const string &Key) {
00132         if (isA(Key)) {
00133             return this;
00134         }
00135         for (unsigned int j=0; j<children.size(); j++)
00136             if (compareKeys(children[j]->key,Key)) {
00137                 return children[j];
00138             }
00139         return 0;
00140     };
00141 
00142     bool isA(const string &Key) const {
00143         return compareKeys(key,Key);
00144     };
00145 
00146     static void removeComment(const string &start, const string &end,
00147                               string &input, bool newline);
00148 
00149     static int findStart(int start, int stop,
00150                          const string &start_key, const string &end_key,
00151                          const string &input, string &what, int &end);
00152     static int findStop(int start, const string &start_string,
00153                         const string &end_string, const string &input, int &ie);
00154 
00155     static bool compareKeys(const string &s1, const string &s2);
00156 
00157     void print(int nind, ostream &) const;
00158 
00159     void removeEmptyLines(string &input);

00161     static void deleteItem(EGS_InputPrivate *p) {
00162         if (p) {
00163             if (!p->nref) {
00164                 delete p;
00165             }
00166             else {
00167                 p->nref--;
00168             }
00169         }
00170     };
00171 
00172 };

00179 EGS_Input::EGS_Input(const EGS_Input &input) {
00180     if (input.p) {
00181         p = input.p;
00182         p->nref++;
00183     }
00184     else {
00185         p = 0;
00186     }

00223 EGS_Input *EGS_Input::takeInputItem(const string &key, bool self) {
00224     if (!p) {
00225         return 0;
00226     }
00227     EGS_InputPrivate *item = p->takeInputItem(key,self);
00228     if (!item) {
00229         return 0;
00230     }
00231     if (item == p && !self) {
00232         return 0;
00233     }
00234     EGS_Input *result = new EGS_Input;
00235     result->p = item;
00236     if (item == p) {
00237         p = 0;
00238     }
00239     return result;
00240 }
00241 
00242 EGS_Input *EGS_Input::getInputItem(const string &key) const {
00243     if (!p) {
00244         return 0;
00245     }
00246     EGS_InputPrivate *item = p->getInputItem(key);
00247     if (!item) {
00248         return 0;
00249     }
00250     item->nref++;
00251     EGS_Input *result = new EGS_Input;
00252     result->p = item;
00253     return result;
00254 }

00256 void EGS_Input::addInputItem(const EGS_Input &input) {
00257     if (!input.p) {
00258         return;
00259     }
00260     if (!p) {
00261         p = new EGS_InputPrivate(*input.p);
00262     }
00263     else {
00264         p->addItem(input.p);
00265     }
00266 }

00281 
00282 template <class T> int EGS_LOCAL
00283 get_input(const EGS_InputPrivate *p, const string &key, vector<T> &values) {
00284     if (!p) {
00285         return -1;
00286     }
00287     const EGS_InputPrivate *p1;
00288     if (!p->children.size()) {
00289         if (!p->isA(key)) {
00290             return -1;
00291         }
00292         p1 = p;
00293     }
00294     else {
00295         for (unsigned int j=0; j<p->children.size(); j++) {
00296             p1 = p->children[j];
00297             if (p1->isA(key)) {
00298                 break;
00299             }
00300             p1 = 0;
00301         }
00302         if (!p1) {
00303             return -1;
00304         }
00305     }
00306     values.erase(values.begin(),values.end());
00307     S_STREAM in(p1->value.c_str());
00308     int error = 0;
00309     while (1) {
00310         T tmp;
00311         in >> tmp;
00312         if (!in.fail()) {
00313             values.push_back(tmp);
00314         }
00315         if (in.eof()) {
00316             if (values.size() <= 0) {
00317                 error = 1;
00318             }
00319             break;
00320         }
00321         if (!in.good()) {
00322             if (values.size() <= 0) {
00323                 error = 2;
00324             }
00325             break;
00326         }
00327     }
00328     return error;
00329 }

00332     return get_input(p,key,values);

00340     return get_input(p,key,values);
00341 }

00343 template <class T> int EGS_LOCAL
00344 get_input(const EGS_InputPrivate *p, const string &key, T &value) {
00345     if (!p) {
00346         return -1;
00347     }
00348     const EGS_InputPrivate *p1;
00349     if (!p->children.size()) {
00350         if (!p->isA(key)) {
00351             return -1;
00352         }
00353         p1 = p;
00354     }
00355     else {
00356         for (unsigned int j=0; j<p->children.size(); j++) {
00357             p1 = p->children[j];
00358             if (p1->isA(key)) {
00359                 break;
00360             }
00361             p1 = 0;
00362         }
00363         if (!p1) {
00364             return -1;
00365         }
00366     }
00367     S_STREAM in(p1->value.c_str());
00368     T tmp;
00369     in >> tmp;
00370     if (!in.fail()) {
00371         value = tmp;
00372         return 0;
00373     }
00374     return 1;
00375 }

00377 int EGS_Input::getInput(const string &key, string &value) const {
00378     vector<string> v;
00379     //int err = get_input(p,key,v);
00380     int err = getInput(key,v);
00381     if (err) {
00382         return err;
00383     }
00384     value = v[0];
00385     for (unsigned int j=1; j<v.size(); j++) {
00386         value += " ";
00387         value += v[j];
00388     }
00389     return 0;
00390 }

00407 
00408 // If the stupid MS compiler would support the >> operator on 64 bit
00409 // integers, we would just use the template as in the other functions.
00410 // But as it doesn't, we need a separate implementation (which is pretty
00411 // simple-minded, but it should do for now).
00412 int EGS_Input::getInput(const string &key, EGS_I64 &value) const {
00413     vector<string> aux;
00414     int err = getInput(key,aux);
00415     if (err) {
00416         return err;
00417     }
00418     if (aux.size() > 1) {
00419         return 1;
00420     }
00421     if (aux[0].size() < 10) {
00422         // if it is less than 10 chars long, it is guaranteed to be
00423         // less then 1e9 => will fit into a 32 bit integer.
00424         int n;
00425         err = getInput(key,n);
00426         if (err) {
00427             return err;
00428         }
00429         value = n;
00430         return 0;
00431     }
00432     int nfirst = 0;
00433     bool neg = false;
00434     if (aux[0][0] == '+') {
00435         nfirst = 1;
00436     }
00437     else if (aux[0][0] == '-') {
00438         nfirst = 1;
00439         neg = true;
00440     };
00441     EGS_I64 fac=1, res = 0;
00442     for (int j=aux[0].size()-1; j>=nfirst; j--) {
00443         if (!isdigit(aux[0][j])) {
00444             return 2;
00445         }
00446         EGS_I64 c = aux[0][j]-48;
00447         res += c*fac;
00448         fac *= 10;
00449     }
00450     if (neg) {
00451         res *= (-1);
00452     }
00453     value = res;
00454     return 0;
00455 }
00456 
00457 
00458 int EGS_Input::getInput(const string &key, const vector<string> &allowed,
00459                         int def, bool *found) const {
00460     string res;
00461     int err = getInput(key,res);
00462     if (!err) {
00463         for (unsigned int j=0; j<allowed.size(); j++) {
00464             if (EGS_InputPrivate::compareKeys(res,allowed[j])) {
00465                 if (found) {
00466                     *found = true;
00467                 }
00468                 return j;
00469             }
00470         }
00471     }
00472     if (found) {
00473         *found = false;
00474     }
00475     return def;
00476 }

00486 
00487 int EGS_InputPrivate::addContentFromFile(const char *fname) {
00488     // the following removes white space at the beginning of file names,
00489     // which may come from the file name being defined in an "include file"
00490     // key-value pair
00491     const char *s = fname;
00492     while (isspace(*s) && (*s)) {
00493         ++s;
00494     }
00495     ifstream in(s);
00496     if (!in) {
00497         return -1;
00498     }
00499     return addContent(in);
00500 }

00503     S_STREAM in(input.c_str());
00504     return setContent(in);
00505 }
00506 
00507 int EGS_InputPrivate::addContentFromString(string &input) {
00508     S_STREAM in(input.c_str());
00509     return addContent(in);
00510 }
00511 
00512 void EGS_InputPrivate::removeComment(const string &start, const string &end,
00513                                      string &input, bool newline) {
00514     string::size_type spos=0, epos=0;
00515     while ((epos = input.find(end,spos)) < input.size()) {
00516         spos = input.find(start,spos);
00517         if (spos < epos) {
00518             string::size_type len = epos - spos;
00519             if (!newline) {
00520                 len += end.size();
00521             }
00522             input.erase(spos,len);
00523             if (newline) {
00524                 spos += end.size();
00525             }
00526         }
00527         else {
00528             spos = epos+1;
00529         }
00530     }
00531 }
00532 
00533 int EGS_InputPrivate::setContent(istream &in) {
00534     for (unsigned int j=0; j<children.size(); j++) {
00535         delete children[j];
00536     }
00537     children.erase(children.begin(),children.end());
00538     return addContent(in);
00539 }
00540 
00541 bool EGS_InputPrivate::compareKeys(const string &s1, const string &s2) {
00542     string t1, t2;
00543     unsigned int j;
00544     for (j=0; j<s1.size(); j++)
00545         if (!isspace(s1[j])) {
00546             t1 += ::toupper(s1[j]);
00547         }
00548     for (j=0; j<s2.size(); j++)
00549         if (!isspace(s2[j])) {
00550             t2 += ::toupper(s2[j]);
00551         }
00552     return (t1 == t2);
00553 
00554 }

00556 #ifdef INPUT_DEBUG
00557     #include <iostream>
00558 #endif
00559 
00560 int EGS_InputPrivate::replace(const string &replace_what,
00561                               const string &replace_with) {
00562     string::size_type pos = 0;
00563     int nr = 0;
00564     while ((pos = key.find(replace_what,pos)) < key.size()) {
00565         key.replace(pos,replace_what.size(),replace_with);
00566         ++nr;
00567     }
00568     pos = 0;
00569     while ((pos = value.find(replace_what,pos)) < value.size()) {
00570         value.replace(pos,replace_what.size(),replace_with);
00571         ++nr;
00572     }
00573     for (int j=0; j<children.size(); j++) {
00574         nr += children[j]->replace(replace_what,replace_with);
00575     }
00576     return nr;
00577 }
00578 #endif

00661 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_InputLoopVariable {
00662 public:
00663     bool is_list;
00664     string vname,
00665            vr;   
00666     char buf[128];
00667     EGS_InputLoopVariable(const string &var) : vname(var), is_list(false) {
00668         vr = "$(";
00669         vr += vname;
00670         vr += ")";
00671     };
00672     virtual ~EGS_InputLoopVariable() {};
00673     const char *getVarNameReplacement() const {
00674         return vr.c_str();
00675     };
00676     const char *getVarReplacement() const {
00677         return buf;
00678     };
00679     virtual void setVarReplacement(int) = 0;
00680     static EGS_InputLoopVariable *getInputLoopVariable(const char *input);
00681 };
00682 
00687 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_IntegerInputLoopVariable : public EGS_InputLoopVariable {
00688 public:
00689     int vmin, vdelta;
00690     EGS_IntegerInputLoopVariable(int  Vmin, int Vdelta, const string &var) :
00691         EGS_InputLoopVariable(var), vmin(Vmin), vdelta(Vdelta) {};
00692     void setVarReplacement(int i) {
00693         int v = vmin + vdelta*i;
00694         sprintf(buf,"%d",v);
00695     };
00696 };
00697 
00702 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_FloatInputLoopVariable : public EGS_InputLoopVariable {
00703 public:
00704     double vmin, vdelta;
00705     string format;
00706     EGS_FloatInputLoopVariable(double Vmin, double Vdel, const string &var, const string &Format) :
00707         EGS_InputLoopVariable(var), vmin(Vmin), vdelta(Vdel), format(Format) {};
00708     void setVarReplacement(int i) {
00709         double v = vmin + vdelta*i;
00710         sprintf(buf,format.c_str(),v);
00711     };
00712 };
00713 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_ListInputLoopVariable : public EGS_InputLoopVariable {
00714 public:
00715     vector<string> list;
00716     EGS_ListInputLoopVariable(vector<string> List, const string &var) :
00717         EGS_InputLoopVariable(var), list(List) {
00718         is_list = true;
00719     };
00720     void setVarReplacement(int i) {
00721         string str = list[i];
00722         sprintf(buf,"%s",str.c_str());
00723     };
00724     int list_size() {
00725         return list.size();
00726     }
00727 };
00728 EGS_InputLoopVariable *EGS_InputLoopVariable::getInputLoopVariable(
00729     const char *input) {
00730     if (!input) {
00731         return 0;
00732     }
00733     S_STREAM in(input);
00734     string name;
00735     int type;
00736     in >> type >> name;
00737     if (in.fail() || !in.good()) {
00738         egsWarning("Failed reading type and name from %s\n",input);
00739         return 0;
00740     }
00741     if (type < 0 || type > 2) {
00742         egsFatal("Invalid loop type in input: %s\n"
00743                  "Only integer [0], float [1] and list [2] are valid types!\n",
00744                  input);
00745     }
00746     EGS_InputLoopVariable *result;
00747     if (type == 0) {
00748         int vmin, vdelta;
00749         in >> vmin >> vdelta;
00750         result = new EGS_IntegerInputLoopVariable(vmin,vdelta,name);
00751     }
00752     else if (type == 1) {
00753         double vmin, vdelta;
00754         in >> vmin >> vdelta;
00755         string format;
00756         in >> format;
00757         if (format.empty()) {
00758             format = "%lg";
00759             if (in.fail()) {
00760                 in.clear();
00761             }
00762         }
00763         result = new EGS_FloatInputLoopVariable(vmin,vdelta,name,format);
00764     }
00765     else if (type == 2) {
00766         vector<string> vstr;
00767         string str, s_tmp;
00768         while (!in.eof()) {
00769             in >> s_tmp;
00770             if (!in.fail()) {
00771                 vstr.push_back(s_tmp);
00772             }
00773         }
00774         result = new EGS_ListInputLoopVariable(vstr,name);
00775         if (in.fail() && in.eof()) { // possibly white spaces at end of line
00776             if (!vstr.size()) { // end-of-line reached and no list-item found
00777                 delete result;
00778                 result = 0;
00779                 egsFatal("No list-items found reading loop-input: %s\n",input);
00780             }
00781             //Found white spaces at the end of loop-input list which is ok.
00782             return result;
00783         }
00784         if (in.bad()) {
00785             delete result;
00786             result = 0;
00787             egsFatal("Fatal error reading loop input list from %s\n",input);
00788         }
00789     }
00790     if (in.fail()) {
00791         egsWarning("Failed reading vmin vdelta from %s\n",input);
00792         delete result;
00793         result = 0;
00794     }
00795     return result;
00796 }
00797 
00798 #ifndef SKIP_DOXYGEN
00799 void EGS_InputPrivate::processInputLoop(EGS_InputPrivate *p) {
00800     egsWarning("Processing input loop\n");
00801     EGS_InputPrivate *ic = p->takeInputItem("loop count");
00802     if (!ic) {
00803         egsWarning("processInputLoop: no 'loop count' input\n");
00804         return;
00805     }
00806     int nloop = -1;
00807     int err = get_input(ic,"loop count",nloop);
00808     delete ic;
00809     if (err || nloop < 1) {
00810         egsWarning("processInputLoop: got %d for loop count, expecting 1 or "
00811                    "more\n",nloop);
00812         return;
00813     }
00814     EGS_InputPrivate *iv;
00815     vector<EGS_InputLoopVariable *> ivars;
00816     while ((iv = p->takeInputItem("loop variable")) != 0) {
00817         EGS_InputLoopVariable *v =
00818             EGS_InputLoopVariable::getInputLoopVariable(iv->value.c_str());
00819         if (v->is_list) {
00820             if (((EGS_ListInputLoopVariable *)v)->list_size()<nloop) {
00821                 egsFatal("procesInputLoop: loop size (%d) larger than list size (%d)!\n"
00822                          "This will cause a segmentation fault error, aborting ....\n",
00823                          nloop, ((EGS_ListInputLoopVariable *)v)->list_size());
00824             }
00825         }
00826         if (!v) egsWarning("processInputLoop: failed to create loop variable"
00827                                " based on the input %s\n",iv->value.c_str());
00828         else {
00829             ivars.push_back(v);
00830         }
00831         delete iv;
00832     }
00833     if (!ivars.size()) {
00834         egsWarning("processInputLoop: no loop variables\n");
00835         return;
00836     }
00837     int nvar = ivars.size();
00838     int j;
00839     /*
00840     for(j=0; j<p->children.size(); j++) {
00841         for(int iloop=0; iloop<nloop; iloop++) {
00842             EGS_InputPrivate *pnew = new EGS_InputPrivate(*p->children[j],true);
00843             for(int ivar=0; ivar<nvar; ivar++) {
00844                 ivars[ivar]->setVarReplacement(iloop);
00845                 pnew->replace(ivars[ivar]->getVarNameReplacement(),
00846                         ivars[ivar]->getVarReplacement());
00847             }
00848             children.push_back(pnew);
00849         }
00850     }
00851     */
00852     for (int iloop=0; iloop<nloop; iloop++) {
00853         for (j=0; j<p->children.size(); j++) {
00854             EGS_InputPrivate *pnew = new EGS_InputPrivate(*p->children[j],true);
00855             for (int ivar=0; ivar<nvar; ivar++) {
00856                 ivars[ivar]->setVarReplacement(iloop);
00857                 pnew->replace(ivars[ivar]->getVarNameReplacement(),
00858                               ivars[ivar]->getVarReplacement());
00859             }
00860             children.push_back(pnew);
00861         }
00862     }
00863 
00864     for (j=0; j<ivars.size(); j++) {
00865         delete ivars[j];
00866     }
00867 }
00868 
00869 int EGS_InputPrivate::addContent(istream &in) {
00870     string input;
00871     bool last_was_space = false;
00872     while (1) {
00873         char c;
00874         in.get(c);
00875         if (in.eof() || !in.good()) {
00876             break;
00877         }
00878         bool take_it = true;
00879         if (isspace(c)) {
00880             if (last_was_space && c != '\n') {
00881                 take_it = false;
00882             }
00883             last_was_space = true;
00884         }
00885         else {
00886             last_was_space = false;
00887         }
00888         if (take_it) {
00889             input += c;
00890         }
00891     }
00892     removeComment("#","\n",input,true);
00893     removeComment("!","\n",input,true);
00894     removeComment("//","\n",input,true);
00895     removeComment("/*","*/",input,false);
00896     removeEmptyLines(input);
00897     int res = 0;
00898     vector<string> start_keys, stop_keys;
00899     int p = 0;
00900     int ep = input.size();
00901     string what;
00902     int ie;
00903     while ((p=findStart(p,ep,start_key_begin,start_key_end,input,what,ie))>=0) {
00904         string the_start = start_key_begin;
00905         string the_end = stop_key_begin;
00906         for (int j=0; j<what.size(); j++) {
00907             char c = ::toupper(what[j]);
00908             if (!isspace(c)) {
00909                 the_start += c;
00910                 the_end += c;
00911             }
00912         }
00913         the_start += start_key_end;
00914         the_end += stop_key_end;
00915         int p1;
00916         int ep = findStop(ie+1,the_start,the_end,input,p1);
00917         if (ep > ie+1) {
00918             EGS_InputPrivate *ip = new EGS_InputPrivate(what);
00919             string content;
00920             content.assign(input,ie+1,p1-ie-1);
00921             input.erase(p,ep-p);
00922             ip->setContentFromString(content);
00923             if (ip->isA("input loop")) {
00924                 processInputLoop(ip);
00925                 delete ip;
00926             }
00927             else {
00928                 children.push_back(ip);
00929             }
00930         }
00931         else {
00932             egsWarning("No matching stop delimeter for %s\n",what.c_str());
00933             return -1;
00934         }
00935     }
00936     p = 0;
00937     string::size_type p1;
00938     while ((p1=input.find('\n',p)) < input.size()) {
00939         int j=p1;
00940         while (--j > p && isspace(input[j]));
00941         if (j > p) {
00942             if (input[j] == ',' || input[j] == '\\') {
00943                 input[p1] = ' ';
00944                 input[j] = ' ';
00945             }
00946         }
00947         p = p1+1;
00948     }
00949     p=0;
00950     while ((p1=input.find('\n',p)) < input.size()) {
00951         string::size_type p2 = input.find('=',p);
00952         if (p2 < p1) {
00953             string what;
00954             what.assign(input,p,p2-p);
00955             string value;
00956             value.assign(input,p2+1,p1-p2-1);
00957             for (int j=0; j<value.size(); j++)
00958                 if (value[j] == ',') {
00959                     value[j] = ' ';
00960                 }
00961             if (compareKeys(what,"includefile")) {
00962                 int res = addContentFromFile(value.c_str());
00963                 if (res) egsWarning("EGS_Input: failed to add content from "
00964                                         "include file %s\n",value.c_str());
00965             }
00966             else {
00967                 EGS_InputPrivate *ip = new EGS_InputPrivate(what,value);
00968                 children.push_back(ip);
00969             }
00970         }
00971         p = p1+1;
00972     }
00973 
00974 #ifdef INPUT_DEBUG
00975     print(0,std::cout);
00976 #endif
00977 
00978     return 0;
00979 
00980 }
00981 
00982 int EGS_InputPrivate::findStop(int start, const string &the_start,
00983                                const string &the_end, const string &input,
00984                                int &ie) {
00985     int ns=0, ne=0;
00986     int have_start=1, have_end=0;
00987     int end_started = start;
00988     for (int j=start; j<input.size(); j++) {
00989         if (!isspace(input[j])) {
00990             char c = ::toupper(input[j]);
00991             if (the_start[ns] == c) {
00992                 ns++;
00993             }
00994             else {
00995                 ns=0;
00996                 if (the_start[ns] == c) {
00997                     ns++;
00998                 }
00999             }
01000             if (ns == the_start.size()) {
01001                 ns=0;
01002                 have_start++;
01003             }
01004             if (!ne) {
01005                 end_started = j;
01006             }
01007             if (the_end[ne] == c) {
01008                 ne++;
01009             }
01010             else {
01011                 ne=0;
01012                 if (the_end[ne] == c) {
01013                     end_started = j;
01014                     ne++;
01015                 }
01016             }
01017             if (ne == the_end.size()) {
01018                 ne = 0;
01019                 have_end++;
01020                 if (have_end == have_start) {
01021                     ie = end_started;
01022                     return j;
01023                 }
01024                 end_started = j+1;
01025             }
01026         }
01027     }
01028     return -1;
01029 }
01030 
01031 int EGS_InputPrivate::findStart(int start, int stop, const string &start_key,
01032                                 const string &end_key, const string &input,
01033                                 string &what, int &end) {
01034     string::size_type pos = start;
01035     unsigned int ns=0;
01036     while (1) {
01037         if (pos >= stop) {
01038             return -1;
01039         }
01040         char c = ::toupper(input[pos++]);
01041         if (start_key[ns] == c) {
01042             ns++;
01043         }
01044         else {
01045             ns=0;
01046             if (start_key[ns] == c) {
01047                 ns++;
01048             }
01049         }
01050         if (ns == start_key.size()) {
01051             break;
01052         }
01053     }
01054     string::size_type epos = input.find(end_key,pos);
01055     if (epos < stop) {
01056         what.assign(input,pos,epos-pos);
01057         end = epos + end_key.size();
01058         return pos-start_key.size();
01059     }
01060     return -2;
01061 }
01062 
01063 void EGS_InputPrivate::print(int indent, ostream &out) const {
01064     if (children.size() > 0) {
01065         if (key.size() > 0) {
01066             for (int j=0; j<indent; j++) {
01067                 out << indent_space;
01068             }
01069             out << start_key_begin << " " << key << start_key_end << endl;
01070         }
01071         indent += 1;
01072         for (int i=0; i<children.size(); i++) {
01073             children[i]->print(indent,out);
01074         }
01075         indent -= 1;
01076         if (key.size() > 0) {
01077             for (int j=0; j<indent; j++) {
01078                 out << indent_space;
01079             }
01080             out << stop_key_begin << " " << key << stop_key_end << endl;
01081         }
01082     }
01083     else {
01084         for (int j=0; j<indent; j++) {
01085             out << indent_space;
01086         }
01087         out << key << " = " << value << endl;
01088     }
01089 }
01090 
01091 void EGS_InputPrivate::removeEmptyLines(string &input) {
01092     int pos=0, pos1;
01093     while ((pos1=input.find('\n',pos)) < input.size()) {
01094         if (pos1 == pos) {
01095             input.erase(pos,1);
01096         }
01097         else {
01098             bool is_only_space = true;
01099             for (int j=pos; j<pos1; j++) {
01100                 if (!isspace(input[j])) {
01101                     is_only_space = false;
01102                     break;
01103                 }
01104             }
01105             if (is_only_space) {
01106                 input.erase(pos,pos1+1-pos);
01107             }
01108             else {
01109                 pos = pos1+1;
01110             }
01111         }
01112     }
01113 }
01114 #endif
01115 
01116 bool EGS_Input::compare(const string &s1, const string &s2) {
01117     return EGS_InputPrivate::compareKeys(s1,s2);
01118 }
01119 
01120 void EGS_Input::print(int nind,ostream &out) {
01121     if (p) {
01122         p->print(nind,out);
01123     }
01124 }

01135 void egs_warning(const char *msg,...) {
01136     va_list ap;
01137     va_start(ap, msg);
01138     vfprintf(stderr, msg, ap);
01139     va_end(ap);
01140 }
01141 
01142 EGS_InfoFunction egsWarning = egs_warning;
01143 
01144 int main() {
01145 
01146     EGS_InputPrivate p("test");
01147     p.setContent(cin);
01148     p.print(0,cout);
01149     return 0;
01150 }
